channel.title: A few coding questions:
channel.description:
Hello, i have a few questions on coding:
1) How do i fix the "invisible chin" glitch?
2) How can i add crowns to different playerrights (example: pr = 4, test mod)
3) How can i make a portal teleport to a place with height = 2 (upstairs in a castle)
Thats all i need, thanks for the help.

item.title: A few coding questions:
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

I believe Galkon created a tutorial on player rights, it’s in the Client Hacking section.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

  1. Server and client sided.
  2. height = 2;
